column2: THIS IS FOXTROT BLACK. ENEMY FORCES SPOTTED IN ROAD NEAR LA PASSAGNE. ITS AN AMBUSH! OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO ECHO BLACK. OBJECTIVE ONE IS SECURE ENOUGH. PROCEED WITH THE PLAN. OVER.
THIS IS ECHO BLACK ONE. ON OUR WAY, ETA FOUR MINUTES. HOLD TIGHT. OVER.
THIS IS ECHO BLACK ONE. WE ARE NOW STARTING TO SWEEP THE LA PASSAGNE AREA. OVER.
ECHO BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. LA PASSAGNE AREA IS CLEARED I REPEAT AREA IS CLEARED. OVER.
FOXTROT BLACK ONE THIS IS FIELD HQ. WHAT IS YOUR STATUS. OVER.
THIS IS FIELD HQ. FOXTROT BLACK ONE PLEASE RESPOND. WHAT IS YOUR SITUATION. CAN YOU HEAR ME. OVER.
ALL FORCES THIS IS FIELD HQ. WE HAVE LOST FOXTROT BLACK, I REPEAT WE HAVE LOST FOXTROT BLACK. STAY ALERT ON THE ROAD SOUTH FROM LA PASSAGNE. OVER.
FIELD HQ TO ALL FORCES. RUSSIAN FORCES ARE DEFEATED. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
